entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'he' and 'him'. He is described as stepping forwards and bowing low to Buckbeak.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A person in the group, referred to as 'she' and 'her'. She turns a deep shade of pink when hearing certain words.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A person in the group, referred to as 'he' and 'him'. He is busy describing his penalties in detail.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: A Hippogriff, described as tethered in front of Hagrid's cabin. It clicks its beak and turns its head towards the group.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Not explicitly mentioned but implied to have a cabin where Buckbeak is tethered.

relationships.description: Harry bows low to Buckbeak without breaking eye contact or blinking, and after a few seconds, Buckbeak sinks into a bow too.
